subject: Soccer
organizations: Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey Webb, a banker from the Cayman Islands, will succeed Jack Warner as the president of Concacaf, the governing body for soccer in North and Central America and the Caribbean.
snippet: Jeffrey Webb, a banker from the Cayman Islands, will succeed Jack Warner as the president of Concacaf, the governing body for soccer in North and Central America and the Caribbean.
